analysis: The project is a test website with a focus on black holes. The current theme is not specified, but the event.json indicates a need for a black hole theme with animated objects and slides. The existing files suggest a basic structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The CSS file needs to be updated to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The JavaScript file needs to be updated to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, and the HTML file needs to be completed to include all necessary sections and a mobile-friendly navigation menu.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Update the JavaScript file to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including the mobile menu toggle.

Complete the HTML content to include all necessary sections such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes, and add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.
